projects.title: SDGA Website
projects.description: A clean and responsive website created for the Saudi Digital Government Authority. The site highlights the authority’s vision of building a strong digital nation. It includes sections for services, initiatives, and news, with a user-friendly layout that works well on all devices. The design reflects Saudi Arabia’s official branding and follows modern web standards to ensure accessibility and performance.

projects.title: Movie Website
projects.description: A dynamic movie browsing platform built with React and TMDB API. Features include movie search, trending movies display, detailed movie information, and a responsive design. Users can explore different movie categories and view trailers.

projects.title: Electro Store
projects.description: A modern electronics e-commerce website built with React. Features a clean product catalog with categories like laptops, smartphones, and accessories. Includes product filtering by price range, brand selection, and a responsive layout that adapts seamlessly to all devices.

projects.title: MATJRK E-commerce Gateway
projects.description: An Arabic e-commerce platform that serves as a gateway for online business. Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, featuring a modern landing page design that introduces users to digital commerce opportunities. Includes responsive sections for services, benefits, and getting started guides.

projects.title: Fashion E-Commerce
projects.description: A stylish fashion e-commerce website built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Features a modern design with product galleries, and a shopping cart system. Each product has a detailed page, and related product recommendations. Implements responsive design for optimal viewing across all devices.

projects.title: Interior Design Studio
projects.description: A sleek interior design website crafted with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Features a dynamic home page, detailed about us section, comprehensive services page, and project portfolio showcase. Implements smooth animations and fully responsive design across all devices.

projects.title: Admin Dashboard
projects.description: A modern admin panel interface built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Features a clean sidebar navigation, data visualization charts, user statistics widgets, and dark/light theme toggle. Includes responsive tables and interactive analytics displays.

projects.title: Academic Dashboard
projects.description: A modern educational platform dashboard built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Features student profile management, project tracking, and comprehensive course listings. Includes a responsive sidebar navigation with profile analytics, project submissions, and course progress monitoring.
